testcase.name: Verify Automation Practice product selection is range specified
testcase.system-out: Given User launches the browser and hit the Automation Practice application.passed When User clicks on the Sign In in the Home Page............................passed Then User verifies whether the SignIn Page is displayed.....................passed When User enters the "automation@abc.com" as username and "1234abc" as password.passed And User clicks on the Sign in button in the Sign In Page...................passed Then User verifies whether Sign In is successful............................passed When User clicks on Women Blouses from the menu.............................passed Then User verifies whether the displayed product is in range mentioned in the page.passed When User clicks on logout button...........................................passed Then User verifies if the user is logout of the application.................passed When User closes the browser................................................passed
